description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=1/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=2/3. Realtime Strategy set during the Golden Age of Piracy with a unique control system built for the xbox controller. Use wind, terrain and different ship types to out manouver your enemies. Presented in 3D, moveable camera to get close in or take a long distance view. Multiple locations, times of day and weather conditions. Campaign and Skirmishes. System Link and !Live play
